verses.verse: וְדָוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> So when David זָקֵ֖ן <S%H2204><s%> was old וְשָׂבַ֣ע <S%H7646><s%> and full יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> of days וַיַּמְלֵ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> he made Solomon בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel

וַיֶּאֱסֹף֙ <S%H622><s%> And he gathered together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> all the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> with the priests וְהַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites

וַיִּסָּֽפְרוּ֙ <S%H5608><s%> were numbered הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> Now the Levites מִבֶּ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> from the age שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> of thirty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וָמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become מִסְפָּרָ֤ם <S%H4557><s%> and their number לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָם֙ <S%H1538><s%> by their polls לִגְבָרִ֔ים <S%H1397><s%> man by man שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> was thirty וּשְׁמוֹנָ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> and eight אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

מֵאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> Of which לְנַצֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H5329><s%> [were] to set forward עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מְלֶ֣אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> the work בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשֹׁטְרִ֥ים <S%H7860><s%> [were] officers וְשֹׁפְטִ֖ים <S%H8199><s%> and judges שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> and six אֲלָפִֽים׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וְאַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> Moreover four אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand שֹׁעֲרִ֑ים <S%H7778><s%> [were] porters וְאַרְבַּ֤עַת <S%H702><s%> and four אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand מְהַֽלְלִ֣ים <S%H1984><s%> praised לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בַּכֵּלִ֕ים <S%H3627><s%> with the instruments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> which I made לְהַלֵּֽל׃ <S%H1984><s%> [said David] to praise

וַיֶּֽחָלְקֵ֥ם <S%H2505><s%> divided דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> And David מַחְלְק֑וֹת <S%H4256><s%> them into courses ס לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> among the sons לֵוִ֔י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi לְגֵרְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H1647><s%> Gershom קְהָ֥ת <S%H6955><s%> Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <S%H4847><s%> and Merari ס
לַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֖י <S%H1649><s%> Of the Gershonites לַעְדָּ֥ן <S%H3936><s%> [were] Laadan וְשִׁמְעִֽי׃ <S%H8096><s%> and Shimei ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons לַעְדָּ֗ן <S%H3936><s%> of Laadan הָרֹ֧אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the chief יְחִיאֵ֛ל <S%H3171><s%> [was] Jehiel וְזֵתָ֥ם <S%H2241><s%> and Zetham וְיוֹאֵ֖ל <S%H3100><s%> and Joel שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> three ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons שִׁמְעִ֗י <S%H8096><s%> of Shimei [שְׁלֹמֹות כ] (שְׁלֹומִ֧ית <S%H8013><s%> Shelomith ק) וַחֲזִיאֵ֛ל <S%H2381><s%> and Haziel וְהָרָ֖ן <S%H2039><s%> and Haran שְׁלֹשָׁ֑ה <S%H7969><s%> three אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> These [were] the chief הָאָב֖וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְלַעְדָּֽן׃ <S%H3936><s%> of Laadan ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons שִׁמְעִ֔י <S%H8096><s%> of Shimei יַ֣חַת <S%H3189><s%> [were] Jahath זִינָ֔א <S%H2126><s%> Zina וִיע֖וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> and Jeush וּבְרִיעָ֑ה <S%H1283><s%> and Beriah אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [were] the sons שִׁמְעִ֖י <S%H8096><s%> of Shimei אַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> These four

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> became יַ֣חַת <S%H3189><s%> And Jahath הָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> was the chief וְזִיזָ֖ה <S%H2125><s%> and Zizah הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <S%H8145><s%> the second וִיע֤וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> but Jeush וּבְרִיעָה֙ <S%H1283><s%> and Beriah לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הִרְבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> had not many בָנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> became לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָ֔ב <S%H1><s%> according to [their] father's לִפְקֻדָּ֖ה <S%H6486><s%> reckoning אֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> therefore they were in one ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons קְהָ֗ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath עַמְרָ֥ם <S%H6019><s%> Amram יִצְהָ֛ר <S%H3324><s%> Izhar חֶבְר֥וֹן <S%H2275><s%> Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H5816><s%> and Uzziel אַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> four ס

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons עַמְרָ֖ם <S%H6019><s%> of Amram אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וּמֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses וַיִּבָּדֵ֣ל <S%H914><s%> was separated אַהֲרֹ֡ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron לְֽהַקְדִּישׁוֹ֩ <S%H6942><s%> that he should sanctify קֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the most קָֽדָשִׁ֤ים <S%H6944><s%> holy things הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he וּבָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> he and his sons עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> ever לְהַקְטִיר֩ <S%H6999><s%> to burn incense לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְשָׁרְת֛וֹ <S%H8334><s%> to minister וּלְבָרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> unto him and to bless בִּשְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> in his name עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

וּמֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> Now [concerning] Moses אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God בָּנָ֕יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons יִקָּרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> were named עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> among שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> of the tribe הַלֵּוִֽי׃ <S%H3878><s%> of Levi
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses גֵּרְשֹׁ֖ם <S%H1647><s%> [were] Gershom וֶאֱלִיעֶֽזֶר׃ <S%H461><s%> and Eliezer
בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons גֵרְשׁ֖וֹם <S%H1647><s%> of Gershom שְׁבוּאֵ֥ל <S%H7619><s%> Shebuel הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> [was] the chief

וַיִּֽהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> had בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אֱלִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H461><s%> of Eliezer רְחַבְיָ֣ה <S%H7345><s%> [were] Rehabiah הָרֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the chief וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> had לֶאֱלִיעֶ֙זֶר֙ <S%H461><s%> And Eliezer בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> sons אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> had none other וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> but the sons רְחַבְיָ֖ה <S%H7345><s%> of Rehabiah רָב֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> many לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> were very
בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons יִצְהָ֖ר <S%H3324><s%> of Izhar שְׁלֹמִ֥ית <S%H8019><s%> Shelomith הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> the chief ס

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons חֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> of Hebron יְרִיָּ֤הוּ <S%H3404><s%> Jeriah הָרֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> the first אֲמַרְיָ֣ה <S%H568><s%> Amariah הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> the second יַחֲזִיאֵל֙ <S%H3166><s%> Jahaziel הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> the third וִֽיקַמְעָ֖ם <S%H3360><s%> and Jekameam הָרְבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7243><s%> the fourth

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons עֻזִּיאֵ֑ל <S%H5816><s%> of Uzziel מִיכָ֣ה <S%H4318><s%> Michah הָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the first וְיִשִּׁיָּ֖ה <S%H3449><s%> and Jesiah הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <S%H8145><s%> the second ס

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> The sons מְרָרִי֙ <S%H4847><s%> of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <S%H4249><s%> Mahli וּמוּשִׁ֔י <S%H4187><s%> and Mushi בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons מַחְלִ֖י <S%H4249><s%> of Mahli אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar וְקִֽישׁ׃ <S%H7027><s%> and Kish

וַיָּ֙מָת֙ <S%H4191><s%> died אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <S%H499><s%> And Eleazar וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> and had ל֛וֹ בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> and had no sons כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> only בָּנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> but daughters וַיִּשָּׂא֥וּם <S%H5375><s%> took בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons קִ֖ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> of Kish אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> and their brethren
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons מוּשִׁ֗י <S%H4187><s%> of Mushi מַחְלִ֥י <S%H4249><s%> Mahli וְעֵ֛דֶר <S%H5740><s%> and Eder וִירֵמ֖וֹת <S%H3406><s%> and Jeremoth שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> three

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> These [were] the sons לֵוִי֩ <S%H3878><s%> of Levi לְבֵ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> after the house אֲבֹתֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers רָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> [even] the chief הָאָב֣וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לִפְקוּדֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6485><s%> as they were counted בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <S%H4557><s%> by number שֵׁמוֹת֙ <S%H8034><s%> of names לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָ֔ם <S%H1538><s%> by their polls עֹשֵׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> that did הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> the work לַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> for the service בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִבֶּ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> from the age עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> of twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וָמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> and upward

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> For David הֵנִ֛יחַ <S%H5117><s%> hath given rest יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְעַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> unto his people וַיִּשְׁכֹּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> that they may dwell בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> Also לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> And also unto the Levites אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> will no לָשֵׂ֧את <S%H5375><s%> they shall no [more] carry אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כֵּלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> nor any vessels לַעֲבֹדָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5656><s%> of it for the service

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בְדִבְרֵ֤י <S%H1697><s%> words דָוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> of David הָאַ֣חֲרֹנִ֔ים <S%H314><s%> For by the last הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like מִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> [were] numbered בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> old לֵוִ֑י <S%H3881><s%> the Levites מִבֶּ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> and above

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For מַעֲמָדָ֞ם <S%H4612><s%> Because their office לְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> [was] to wait בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> on the sons אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron לַעֲבֹדַת֙ <S%H5656><s%> for the service בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in הַחֲצֵרוֹת֙ <S%H2691><s%> in the courts וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and in הַלְּשָׁכ֔וֹת <S%H3957><s%> and in the chambers וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and in טָהֳרַ֖ת <S%H2893><s%> and in the purifying לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of all holy things וּמַֽעֲשֵׂ֔ה <S%H4639><s%> and the work עֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> of the service בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וּלְלֶ֨חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread הַֽמַּעֲרֶ֜כֶת <S%H4635><s%> row וּלְסֹ֤לֶת <S%H5560><s%> and for the fine flour לְמִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> for meat offering וְלִרְקִיקֵ֣י <S%H7550><s%> cakes הַמַּצּ֔וֹת <S%H4682><s%> and for the unleavened וְלַֽמַּחֲבַ֖ת <S%H4227><s%> and for [that which is baked in] the pan וְלַמֻּרְבָּ֑כֶת <S%H7246><s%> and for that which is fried וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מְשׂוּרָ֖ה <S%H4884><s%> and for all manner of measure וּמִדָּֽה׃ <S%H4060><s%> and size

וְלַעֲמֹד֙ <S%H5975><s%> And to stand בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> every morning בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning לְהֹד֥וֹת <S%H3034><s%> to thank וּלְהַלֵּ֖ל <S%H1984><s%> and praise לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> and likewise לָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> and likewise at even
